articles.title: Home of the Week: Petite marsh-front cottage on Plum Island for $875K
articles.description:
The two-bedroom Newburyport home overlooks a tidal basin for the Atlantic Ocean.

The post Home of the Week: Petite marsh-front cottage on Plum Island for $875K appeared first on Boston.com.
